page.title: 08Tourism
page.content: Visitors to the area may enjoy hill-walking in the beautiful Ochil hills.In nearby Glendevon,there are reservoirs to fish for trout and the renowned Loch Leven is only 8 miles distant in Kinross.For the Golfer,Muckhart has its own 18 hole Golf Course and ten miles to the North-East lies the world famous Gleneagles Hotel and Golf Courses.Mary Queen of Scots was reputed to have stayed at the now demolished Cowden Castle.Tourists may wish to visit Rumbling Bridge Gorge,1 mile to the east. There is a guest house and one or two private houses and farms offering bed and breakfast accomodation,while good food is served in the Inn at Muckhart
